name: end2endtests-cypress
description: End-2-end automated tests for the one.network platform

scripts.visual-regression:baseline: cypress-tags run --quiet --env TAGS='@visual and not @ignore',type=base --config screenshotsFolder=cypress/snapshots/base
scripts.visual-regression:ci: cypress-tags run --quiet --env TAGS='@visual and not @ignore',type=actual --reporter junit --reporter-options 'mochaFile=cypress/results/TEST-[hash].xml,toConsole=false'
scripts.cypress:ci: cypress run --env TAGS='not @visual and not @ignore' --reporter junit --reporter-options 'mochaFile=cypress/results/TEST-[hash].xml,toConsole=false' --browser chrome

author: Diogo Costa
